thiefworld.agents

Class MeatSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.agents.Agent
      • thiefworld.agents.FoodSource
        • thiefworld.agents.MeatSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class MeatSource
extends FoodSource
    A source of meat that uses a constant (unreplenishable) quantity.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea
    See Also:
